hero.tag: Wheel Weights Taping and Packaging Machine
hero.title: High-Precision Automated Production
hero.description: Transform raw wheel weights into perfectly taped and packaged products with our integrated system capable of processing 90 kg per hour

specifications.title: Product Specifications
specifications.subtitle: Key Features & Technical Specifications
specifications.intro: The final automated stage in our production line involves preparing the precisely cutting segments by Chopping and Marking Machine for market readiness, particularly focusing on Adhesive Wheel Weights.The final automation stage in our production line involves the precise stacking and packaging of the cut segments, with a particular focus on the Adhesive Wheel Weights, making them ready for market. Our sophisticated taping and packaging machine meticulously applies high-performance adhesive tape, transforming the segments into Self-adhesive Balancing Weights. This process is optimized for producing Steel Wheel Weights, especially popular Fe stick on wheel weight types designed for modern wheel weights for aluminum wheels. The machine then accurately arranges these Steel Balancing Weights onto release liner strips and prepares them for final packaging, ensuring product integrity and ease of use for technicians. The result is a finished product ready for distribution . Our Taping and Packaging Machine is aligned with the latest industry standards. Similar to the high-efficiency machines used by leading manufacturers like 3M (USA), Plombco (USA) known for their advanced automation and precision in wheel weight production, our machine offers superior performance. If you want to compare our production with the process in this video, please visit our youtube channel

description.title: Mastering Production Excellence
description.intro: Our Taping and Packaging Machine stands at the forefront of wheel weight automation technology. This precision-engineered system transforms your production line, delivering perfectly finished products ready for market distribution.

system.title: System Features
system.description: Powered by advanced Delta PLC technology, our system offers unprecedented control over the finishing process. The intuitive 7" interface provides complete command over production parameters, while real-time monitoring ensures consistent quality across high-volume operations.

list.config: Dual Configuration System: Seamlessly switch between 5g+5g and 5g+10g formats
list.control: Precision Control: Advanced Delta PLC system with intuitive interface
list.monitoring: Real-Time Monitoring: Live production tracking and adjustment
list.quality: Automated Quality Control: Consistent tape application and alignment
list.integration: Optional Integration: Synchronized packaging unit capability
list.energy: Energy Efficient Design: Optimized power consumption at 0.2 kWh/hr

production.title: Production Excellence
production.description: The system's innovative design combines high-speed production with precision quality control. The optional packaging unit integrates seamlessly with the taping process, creating a fully automated finishing line that transforms raw wheel weights into market-ready products.

integration.title: Integration & Control
integration.description: Every aspect of the production process is monitored and controlled through our advanced interface system. The machine's modular design allows for easy integration of the optional packaging unit, while the sophisticated control system ensures perfect synchronization between taping and packaging operations.

list.productivity: Maximum Productivity: Process up to 90 kg per hour
list.quality: Superior Quality Control: Consistent tape application
list.flexibility: Flexible Configuration: Easy switching between weight combinations
list.packaging: Efficient Packaging: Optional unit processes 15 boxes per hour
list.performance: Reliable Performance: Built for continuous operation

meta.title: Wheel Weights Taping and Packaging Machine | High-Precision Automated Production | YILSA
meta.description: Transform raw wheel weights into perfectly taped and packaged products with our integrated system capable of processing 90 kg per hour. Dual configuration for 5g+5g and 5g+10g combinations.
